attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it that we have a motivated teaching profession that is constantly let down by this government.Is nobody accountable for this debacle with the effect of demorallisation, again.
Can we have someone who is responsible or is it too close to their holiday.
No vote from us in the next election for this incompetent government, even though it was started by the conservatives.
Please sign up for this petition as some one is responsible and should be removed.

bill clark

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
